tool_description: Generates formatted notification messages using predefined templates and order-specific data for consistent customer communications.

template_type.description: Type of notification template: order_confirmed, shipped, delivered, delayed, cancelled, returned, payment_failed

order_id.description: Order identifier to populate template data

order_total.description: Total order amount for financial templates

tracking_number.description: Shipping tracking number for shipping-related templates

product_names.description: List of product names in the order

language.description: Language code for template localization (en, es, fr, de)

include_links.description: Whether to include tracking and account links in the message

error_messages: Invalid template type: Template type must be one of [order_confirmed, shipped, delivered, delayed, cancelled, returned, payment_failed].
Missing required data: Some template variables cannot be populated. Ensure all required parameters for the template type are provided.
Template generation failed: Unable to generate message content. Check template type and provided data parameters.
Unsupported language: Language code must be one of [en, es, fr, de]. Use a supported language code.
Order data not accessible: Cannot retrieve order information for template population. Verify order_id exists and is accessible.
usage: Provide template_type, order_id, and customer_name to generate a formatted notification message. Include relevant optional parameters based on template type (e.g., tracking_number for shipped template).

message_content.description: Generated notification message with populated order data

subject_line.description: Generated subject line for email notifications

template_used.description: The template type that was used for generation

language.description: Language code of the generated content

character_count.description: Total character count of the generated message
